name: Pieces
description:
The fastest, smartest AI Assistant for code snippets

Automatically or manually save code from anywhere, then power up with code auto-completion from your own snippets. 100% free!

Instantly save snippets from JetBrains or your browser

  • Highlight code in JetBrains and simply right-click or use a keyboard shortcut to save snippets
  • One-click save snippets from any webpage with Pieces browser plugins

Auto-save useful snippets

  • The Pieces AI Assistant suggests auto-completions as you type
  • Suggestions are trained on your personal repo of saved snippets. Pieces code completions are complimentary to open source-centric auto-completion tools!
  • Suggestions can be based on the snippet name, code contents or any metadata such as a tag
  • No size limit for auto-completions - auto-complete from a single line or a 1000-line widget tree

Saved snippets are intelligently enriched

  • Auto-classifies your snippet by language
  • Auto-generates tags based on the content or structure of the snippet, where it was saved from and more. So you can quickly find that one snippet later

Manage snippets inside JetBrains

  • View and insert saved snippets from the Pieces list in JetBrains

Unlock more features with the Pieces desktop app

  • The Pieces desktop app enables additional features such as:
  • Responsive UI to view snippets in ultra-narrow or wide screens
  • Save screenshots of code to Pieces, instantly receive the copyable snippet. Death to manually retyping!
  • (Coming soon) Share snippets via shareable links. Shared links include the snippet, tags and more meta-data
  • And much more!

Safe & Secure

  • Runs 100% locally on your machine with the option to connect to the Cloud for backup, sync and sharing

Installation

To get started it is required to download Pieces from pieces.app/install. This enables Pieces to run locally on your machine and manages connections to Pieces plugins. This plugin will not run without Pieces installed.
